job.title: DE LAPP/SAR Underwriter
job.description: If you are a Mortgage Underwriter with experience please read onbrbrWe are a 10 plus year company affiliated with a local builder looking to start up our underwriting department Do to our continuous growth and demand for our services we decided to keep our loans in house If you are a self starter and looking for a challenge to help establish and grow our underwriting department then manage this department as we grow Please apply nowbrbrWhat You Will Be DoingbrbrYou will be underwriting mainly new construction builds and purchase mortgages We are looking for a self motivated individual that wants to start our underwriting department and give us ideas on how to make our underwriting department successful You will need to be well versed in FHA VA and conventional mortgages to help us grow and then manage the underwriting department down the roadbrbrWhat You Need for this Positionbrulli DElili LAPPSARlili EncompassbrliulWhats In It for Youbrulli Salary range 90k to 110klili Full Benefitslili Individual paid health insurancebrliulSo if you are a DE LAPPSAR Underwriter with experience please apply todaybrbrOr email me at thomasstampleycybercoderscombrbrstronguEmail Your Resume In Word TobrbrustrongLooking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you Clicking apply is the best way to apply but you may alsobrbrThomasStampleyCyberCoderscombrulliPlease do NOT change the email subject line in any way You must keep the JobID linkedin  WS21647413  in the email subject line for your application to be consideredbrliulThomas Stampley  Recruiter  CyberCodersbrbrApplicants must be authorized to work in the USbrbrstrongCyberCoders Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity EmployerbrbrstrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by lawbrbrstrongYour Right to Workstrong  In compliance with federal law all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire
